Craft an item of type: composter
inventory=[{"type": "crimson_planks", "quantity": 3, "index": 16}, {"type": "warped_slab", "quantity": 3, "index": 18}, {"type": "jungle_slab", "quantity": 2, "index": 19}, {"type": "birch_slab", "quantity": 1, "index": 20}, {"type": "black_glazed_terracotta", "quantity": 40, "index": 21}, {"type": "leather_helmet", "quantity": 1, "index": 24}, {"type": "jungle_log", "quantity": 64, "index": 29}, {"type": "yellow_carpet", "quantity": 50, "index": 37}]

thought: To craft a composter, I need to craft some crimson_slabs first. I have 3 crimson planks in slot 16. The recipe for crimson_slabs requires 3 crimson planks stacked vertically in the crafting grid. Therefore I will place one of them in slot 1.
Ok
act: move from slot 16 to slot 1 with quantity 1

Ok

Ok
act: move from slot 20 to slot 1 with quantity 1
